item.title: New Dylan Furr Album Teaser
item.author: Graham Butler
item.description: Check out the teaser video for Dylan Furr’s new album, “Juxtaposition,” for which I engineered all the drum tracks. Also be sure to pick up the album here!

item.title: Tonight on House of Prog Radio
item.author: Graham Butler
item.description:
Listen in to Tim Correll’s show on House of Prog Radio tonight at 7:00PM Eastern. They will be playing a selection from my album Dread Fascination.

http://social.houseofprog.com/

item.title: New Movie Trailer
item.author: Graham Butler
item.description:
Check out the trailer for the upcoming film “Grace” starring Annika Marks & Sharon Lawrence. I’m super excited since I played drums on the soundtrack, written by Judson Brown.

http://gracethemovie.us/

item.title: New Studio
item.author: Graham Butler
item.description: I’m now moved into my new production studio in Sherman Oaks, CA! I use it in conjunction with some other studios in the area. Check out my instagram photos above for pics. Here’s a list of gear I use.

item.title: Dread Fascination
item.author: Graham Butler
item.description: My debut solo album, Dread Fascination is available to listen for free. I’d love to know what you think!
